(Uh, about this gesunt thing...I think that's what the transformers that 
combine are called; do we have to have them, the Gods ones? I think it's 
just going to get confusing, and I know they're bots, but they still sound 
like gods. It sounds like your mixing fantasy with SF (science fiction), 
something you don't do. Trust me, I'm in the market for professional 
writing.)
